abstract: Day two of ABC’s new reality series “High School Musical: Get in the Picture” sank further in the ratings on Monday night, drawing just 3.2 million viewers at 8 p.m. on Monday, according to Nielsen’s estimates. The show’s debut on Sunday had drawn 4 million viewers.
lead_paragraph: Day two of ABC’s new reality series “High School Musical: Get in the Picture” sank further in the ratings on Monday night, drawing just 3.2 million viewers at 8 p.m. on Monday, according to Nielsen’s estimates. The show’s debut on Sunday had drawn 4 million viewers.

headline.main: New ‘High School Musical’ Reality Show Continues to Tank
